      <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Notes">Notes</span></h2> 
      <div class="reflist" style="list-style-type: lower-alpha;"> 
       <div class="mw-references-wrap">
        <ol class="references"> 
         <li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">In the recognized <a href="/wiki/Minority_languages_of_Croatia" title="Minority languages of Croatia">minority languages of Croatia</a> and the most spoken second languages: 
           <dl>
            <dd>
             <ul>
              <li><a href="/wiki/Czech_language" title="Czech language">Czech</a>: <i lang="cs">Chorvatská republika</i></li> 
              <li><a href="/wiki/German_language" title="German language">German</a>: <i lang="de">Republik Kroatien</i></li> 
              <li><a href="/wiki/French_language" title="French language">French</a>: <i lang="fr">République de Croatie</i></li> 
              <li><a href="/wiki/Hungarian_language" title="Hungarian language">Hungarian</a>: <i lang="hu">Horvát Köztársaság</i></li> 
              <li><a href="/wiki/Italian_language" title="Italian language">Italian</a>: <i lang="it">Repubblica di Croazia</i></li> 
              <li><a href="/wiki/Rusyn_language" title="Rusyn language">Rusyn</a>: <span lang="rue">Републіка Хорватія</span></li> 
              <li><a href="/wiki/Serbian_language" title="Serbian language">Serbian</a>: <span lang="sr">Република Хрватска</span></li> 
              <li><a href="/wiki/Slovak_language" title="Slovak language">Slovak</a>: <i lang="sk">Chorvátska republika</i></li> 
              <li><a href="/wiki/Slovene_language" title="Slovene language">Slovene</a>: <i lang="sl">Republika Hrvaška</i></li> 
              <li><a href="/wiki/Ukrainian_language" title="Ukrainian language">Ukrainian</a>: <span lang="uk">Респу́бліка Хорва́тія</span></li>
             </ul>
            </dd>
           </dl> </span></li> 
         <li id="cite_note-2"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-2">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><span class="rt-commentedText nowrap"><span class="IPA nopopups noexcerpt"><a href="/wiki/Help:IPA/English" title="Help:IPA/English">/<span style="border-bottom:1px dotted"><span title="/ˈ/: primary stress follows">ˈ</span><span title="'z' in 'zoom'">z</span><span title="/ɑː/: 'a' in 'father'">ɑː</span><span title="/ɡ/: 'g' in 'guy'">ɡ</span><span title="'r' in 'rye'">r</span><span title="/ɛ/: 'e' in 'dress'">ɛ</span><span title="'b' in 'buy'">b</span></span>/</a></span> <span class="nowrap" style="font-size:85%">(<span class="unicode haudio"><span class="fn"><span style="white-space:nowrap;margin-right:.25em;"><a href="/wiki/File:LL-Q1860_(eng)-Vealhurl-Zagreb.wav" title="About this sound"><img alt="About this sound" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/Loudspeaker.svg/11px-Loudspeaker.svg.png" decoding="async" width="11" height="11" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/Loudspeaker.svg/17px-Loudspeaker.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/Loudspeaker.svg/22px-Loudspeaker.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="20" data-file-height="20"></a></span><a href="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/16/LL-Q1860_%28eng%29-Vealhurl-Zagreb.wav" class="internal" title="LL-Q1860 (eng)-Vealhurl-Zagreb.wav">listen</a></span></span>)</span></span>, <a href="/wiki/Help:Pronunciation_respelling_key" title="Help:Pronunciation respelling key"><i title="English pronunciation respelling"><span style="font-size:90%">ZAG</span>-reb</i></a>, <a href="/wiki/Help:Pronunciation_respelling_key" title="Help:Pronunciation respelling key"><i title="English pronunciation respelling"><span style="font-size:90%">ZAH</span>-greb</i></a>, <a href="/wiki/Help:Pronunciation_respelling_key" title="Help:Pronunciation respelling key"><i title="English pronunciation respelling">zah-<span style="font-size:90%">GREB</span></i></a>; <small>Croatian pronunciation:&nbsp;</small><span title="Representation in the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA)" class="IPA"><a href="/wiki/Help:IPA/Serbo-Croatian" title="Help:IPA/Serbo-Croatian">[zǎːɡreb]</a></span> <span class="nowrap" style="font-size:85%">(<span class="unicode haudio"><span class="fn"><span style="white-space:nowrap;margin-right:.25em;"><a href="/wiki/File:Hr-Zagreb.ogg" title="About this sound"><img alt="About this sound" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/Loudspeaker.svg/11px-Loudspeaker.svg.png" decoding="async" width="11" height="11" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/Loudspeaker.svg/17px-Loudspeaker.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8a/Loudspeaker.svg/22px-Loudspeaker.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="20" data-file-height="20"></a></span><a href="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/42/Hr-Zagreb.ogg" class="internal" title="Hr-Zagreb.ogg">listen</a></span></span>)</span></span> </li> 
         <li id="cite_note-6"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-6">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Apart from Croatian, <a href="/wiki/Regions_of_Croatia" title="Regions of Croatia">state counties</a> have <a href="/wiki/Minority_languages_of_Croatia" title="Minority languages of Croatia">official regional languages</a> that are used for official government business and commercially. In <a href="/wiki/Istria_County" title="Istria County">Istria County</a> minority is <a href="/wiki/Italian_language_in_Croatia" title="Italian language in Croatia">Italian-speaking</a><sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3">[1]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-Census-2011-languages_4-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Census-2011-languages-4">[2]</a></sup> while select counties bordering Serbia <a href="/wiki/Serbian_language_in_Croatia" title="Serbian language in Croatia">speak standard Serbian</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5">[3]</a></sup> Other notable–albeit significantly less-present minority languages in Croatia include: <a href="/wiki/Czech_language" title="Czech language">Czech</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hungarian_language" title="Hungarian language">Hungarian</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Slovak_language" title="Slovak language">Slovak</a>.</span> </li> 
         <li id="cite_note-7"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-7">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">The <a href="/w/index.php?title=Writing_system_of_Croatia&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Writing system of Croatia (page does not exist)">writing system of Croatia</a> is legally <a href="/wiki/Croatian_language#Official_status" title="Croatian language">protected by federal law</a>. Efforts to recognise minority scripts, pursuant to international law, on a local level, has been met with <a href="/wiki/Anti-Cyrillic_protests_in_Croatia" title="Anti-Cyrillic protests in Croatia">protests</a>.</span> </li> 
         <li id="cite_note-15"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-15">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">IPA transcription of "<i>Republika Hrvatska</i>": (<small>Croatian pronunciation:&nbsp;</small><span title="Representation in the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA)" class="IPA"><a href="/wiki/Help:IPA/Serbo-Croatian" title="Help:IPA/Serbo-Croatian">[ˈrepǔblika ˈxř̩ʋaːtskaː]</a></span>).</span> </li> 
        </ol>
       </div>
      </div> 
      <div style="clear:both;"></div>

          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.dzs.hr/Eng/censuses/census2011/results/htm/E01_01_04/e01_01_04_RH.html">"Population by Ethnicity, by Towns/Municipalities, 2011 Census"</a>. <i>Census of Population, Households and Dwellings 2011</i>.         <li id="cite_note-9"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-9">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFTežak-Gregl2003" class="citation journal cs1">Težak-Gregl, Tihomila (December 2003). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://hrcak.srce.hr/index.php?show=clanak&amp;id_clanak_jezik=26644">"Prilog poznavanju neolitičkih obrednih predmeta u neolitiku sjeverne Hrvatske"</a> [A Contribution to Understanding Neolithic Ritual Objects in the Northern Croatia Neolithic]. <i>Opvscvla Archaeologica Radovi Arheološkog Zavoda</i> (in Croatian).         <li id="cite_note-Margetić-41"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Margetić_41-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

        <li id="cite_note-57"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-57">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFPolatschek1989" class="citation book cs1">Polatschek, Max (1989). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=SZu0AAAAIAAJ"><i>Franz Ferdinand: Europas verlorene Hoffnung</i></a> (in German).         <li id="cite_note-NYTimes-Otkos10-92"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-NYTimes-Otkos10_92-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.jutarnji.hr/arhiva/kronologija-tezak-put-od-priznanja-do-kucanja-na-vrata-eu/3756672/">"Kronologija: Težak put od priznanja do kucanja na vrata EU - Jutarnji List"</a>. <i>www.jutarnji.hr</i>. 2 October 2006<span class="reference-accessdate">.           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.cia.gov/the-world-factbook/countries/croatia/">"World Factbook"</a>. <a href="/wiki/Central_Intelligence_Agency" title="Central Intelligence Agency">Central Intelligence Agency</a><span class="reference-accessdate">. (identifier)">PMC</a>&nbsp;<span class="cs1-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7723057">7723057</a></span>. <a           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.index.hr/vijesti/clanak/savez-udruga-hrvataiz-bih-izabrao-novo-celnistvo/145769.aspx">"Savez udruga Hrvata iz BiH izabrao novo čelništvo"</a> [Union of associations of Bosnia and Herzegovina Croats elects new leadership] (in Croatian).         <li id="cite_note-255"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-255">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

        <li id="cite_note-Huzjan-288"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Huzjan_288-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFHuzjan2008" class="citation journal cs1">Huzjan, Vladimir (July 2008). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://hrcak.srce.hr/index.php?show=clanak&amp;id_clanak_jezik=43829">"Pokušaj otkrivanja nastanka i razvoja kravate kao riječi i odjevnoga predmeta"</a> [The origin and development of the tie (kravata) as a word and as a garment]. <i>Povijesni Prilozi</i> (in Croatian). Croatian Institute of History. <b>34</b> (34): 103–120. <a href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/0351-9767">0351-9767</a><span class="reference-accessdate">.         <li id="cite_note-KRK-Baška-304"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-KRK-Baška_304-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.krk.hr/en/offer/attractions/the_baska_tablet">"The Baška tablet"</a>.         <li id="cite_note-321"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-321">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFVozab2014" class="citation journal cs1">Vozab, Dina (December 2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://hrcak.srce.hr/135683">"Tisak u krizi: analiza trendova u Hrvatskoj od 2008. do 2013"</a>. <i>Medijske Studije</i> (in Croatian). <b>5</b> (10): 141<span class="reference-accessdate">.       <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Bibliography">Bibliography</span></h2> 
      <style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1004355016">.mw-parser-output .refbegin{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul{margin-left:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li{margin-left:0;padding-left:3.2em;text-indent:-3.2em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents ul,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents ul li{list-style:none}@media(max-width:720px){.mw-parser-output .refbegin-hanging-indents>ul>li{padding-left:1.6em;text-indent:-1.6em}}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-100{font-size:100%}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns{margin-top:0.3em}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns dl,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns ol,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns ul{margin-top:0}.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns li,.mw-parser-output .refbegin-columns dd{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}</style>
      <div class="refbegin refbegin-columns references-column-width" style="column-width: 30em">

(20 October 2005). <span class="cs1-lock-registration" title="Free registration required"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/killingtrapgenoc0000midl"><i>The Killing Trap: Genocide in the Twentieth Century</i></a></span> (First&nbsp;ed.). <a href="/wiki/Cambridge" title="Cambridge">Cambridge</a>: <a href="/wiki/Cambridge_University_Press" title="Cambridge University Press">Cambridge University Press</a>. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-139-44539-9" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-139-44539-9"><bdi>978-1-139-44539-9</bdi></a><span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">25 March</span> 2013</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=The+Killing+Trap%3A+Genocide+in+the+Twentieth+Century&amp;rft.place=Cambridge&amp;rft.edition=First&amp;rft.pub=Cambridge+University+Press&amp;rft.date=2005-10-20&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-139-44539-9&amp;rft.aulast=Midlarsky&amp;rft.aufirst=Manus+I.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fkillingtrapgenoc0000midl&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACroatia" class="Z3988"></span></li> 
        <li>
         <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFMagaš2007" class="citation book cs1">Magaš, Branka (2007). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=OY5pAAAAMAAJ"><i>Croatia Through History: The Making of a European State</i></a>. Saqi Books. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-86356-775-9" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-86356-775-9"><bdi>978-0-86356-775-9</bdi></a><span class="reference-accessdate">.         <li>
         <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFMužić2007" class="citation book cs1">Mužić, Ivan (2007). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.muzic-ivan.info/hrvatska_povijest.pdf"><i>Hrvatska povijest devetoga stoljeća</i></a> [<i>Croatian Ninth Century History</i>] <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> (in Croatian).         <li>
         <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFTomasevich2001" class="citation book cs1">Tomasevich, Jozo (2001). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=fqUSGevFe5MC"><i>War and Revolution in Yugoslavia, 1941–1945: Occupation and Collaboration</i></a>.         <li>
         <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFDIP1990_(a)" class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150514021334/http://www.izbori.hr/arhiva/pdf/1990/1990_2_1_Sabor_Statistika_Stat_podaci.pdf">"Statistički pokazatelji o provedenim izborima za zastupnike u Sabor Socijalističke Republike Hrvatske – Prilog"</a> [Statistical Indicators on Performed Elections of Representatives in the Parliament of the Socialist Republic of Croatia – Annex] <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span> (in Croatian).         <li>
         <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREF2013_Statistical_Yearbook_of_the_Republic_of_Croatia" class="citation book cs1">Ostroški, Ljiljana, ed.              <li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Croatian_cities&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li>
            </ul>
           </div>

               <tr>
                <td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="3" style="text-align:left;">
                 <div>
                  <div class="plainlist">
                   <ul>
                    <li><sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/Island#Oceanic_islands" title="Island">Oceanic islands</a> within the vicinity of Europe are usually grouped with the continent even though they are not situated on its continental shelf.</li>
                    <li><sup>2</sup> Some countries completely outside the conventional geographical boundaries of Europe are commonly associated with the continent due to ethnological links.</li>
                   </ul>
                  </div>
                 </div></td>
               </tr>

                <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">Geographically fully located</th>
                <td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;background:#f6f6f6;">
                 <div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

                 <div>
                  <a href="/wiki/File:Balkan_topo_en.jpg" class="image"><img alt="Balkan topo en.jpg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b6/Balkan_topo_en.jpg/100px-Balkan_topo_en.jpg" decoding="async" width="100" height="91" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b6/Balkan_topo_en.jpg/150px-Balkan_topo_en.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b6/Balkan_topo_en.jpg/200px-Balkan_topo_en.jpg 2x" data-file-width="840" data-file-height="767"></a>

               <tr>
                <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">Significantly located</th>
                <td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;background:transparent;">
                 <div style="padding:0em 0.25em"> 
                  <ul>
                   <li><a href="/wiki/Serbia" title="Serbia">Serbia</a></li> 
                   <li><a href="/wiki/Greece" title="Greece">Greece</a></li> 
                   <li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Croatia</a></li>
                  </ul> 
                 </div></td>
               </tr>
               <tr>
                <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">Mostly outside of the peninsula</th>
                <td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;background:#f6f6f6;">
                 <div style="padding:0em 0.25em"> 
                  <ul>
                   <li><a href="/wiki/Romania" title="Romania">Romania</a></li> 
                   <li><a href="/wiki/Slovenia" title="Slovenia">Slovenia</a></li> 
                   <li><a href="/wiki/Turkey" title="Turkey">Turkey</a></li>
                  </ul> 
                 </div></td>
               </tr>
               <tr>
                <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">See also</th>
                <td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;background:transparent;">
                 <div style="padding:0em 0.25em"> 
                  <ul>
                   <li><a href="/wiki/Southeast_Europe" title="Southeast Europe">Southeast Europe</a></li> 
                   <li><a href="/wiki/History_of_the_Balkans" title="History of the Balkans">History of the Balkans</a></li> 
                   <li><a href="/wiki/Languages_of_the_Balkans" title="Languages of the Balkans">Balkan languages</a> <small>(<a href="/wiki/Balkan_sprachbund" title="Balkan sprachbund">Sprachbund</a>)</small></li> 
                   <li><a href="/wiki/Balkanization" title="Balkanization">Balkanization</a></li>
                  </ul> 
                 </div></td>
               </tr>
               <tr>
                <td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="3">
                 <div>
                  <sup>1</sup> <a href="/wiki/2008_Kosovo_declaration_of_independence" title="2008 Kosovo declaration of independence">Declared independence</a> from Serbia on 17 February 2008 and is <a href="/wiki/International_recognition_of_Kosovo" title="International recognition of Kosovo">recognised by&nbsp;113</a> <a href="/wiki/List_of_United_Nations_member_states" class="mw-redirect" title="List of United Nations member states">United Nations member states</a>, while 10 states have recognized Kosovo only to later withdraw their recognition..
                 </div></td>
               </tr>
              </tbody>
             </table>
            </div>

    <nav id="p-lang" class="mw-portlet mw-portlet-lang vector-menu vector-menu-portal portal" aria-labelledby="p-lang-label" role="navigation"> 
     <h3 id="p-lang-label"> <span>Languages</span> </h3> 
     <div class="vector-menu-content"> 
      <ul class="vector-menu-content-list">
       <li class="interlanguage-link interwiki-ace"><a href="https://ace.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kroasia" title="Kroasia – Achinese" lang="ace" hreflang="ace" class="interlanguage-link-target">Acèh</a></li>
       <li class="interlanguage-link interwiki-kbd"><a href="https://kbd.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A5%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%83%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%8D" title="Хоруатиэ – Kabardian" lang="kbd" hreflang="kbd" class="interlanguage-link-target">Адыгэбзэ</a></li>
